FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.Name: EmpirePatchBase

linkButtonToolTips.li: The layout of this GUI was made using NesGUI, a tool for modders that helps with creating RimWorld GUI! Click to learn more.

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.authorStringBase: All of the code for this update has been developed by {0}.
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.introStringBase: A new update for {0} has been released: v.{1}. The following changes have occurred:

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Bug Fixes and Settlements Defense Rebalance
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: Fixed some bugs related to Traits and rebalance the Automatic Defense system a bit to be more fair, would appreciate feedback on it

patchNoteLines.li: We have a new member on the team! @AutumnLight has contributed to the mod first by fixing and optimizing the Trait Selection Screen!

additionalNotes.li: Code written by AutumnLight and TheSeaMoon
I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

patchNoteLines.li: With the help of the Talented pinedog, we have managed to fix the Xenotype Generation, so now Xenotypes Unit works Perfectly!

additionalNotes.li: Code written mostly by pinedog with some small tweaks of my own
I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Integrated Additional Building Addon
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: I integrated the Empire - Additional Buildings mod in the main version of Empire

additionalNotes.li: I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Added Xenotype Selection
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: I added a way to select Xenotype when creating a Military Unit, currently does not cost anything to change it.

additionalNotes.li: I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Added a new Trait
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: I added a new Faction Trait, Slaver. It's more of a proof of Concept than anything

additionalNotes.li: I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Rebalanced Biomes
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: Biomes were Rebalanced in this Update, I have also added a few more buildings

additionalNotes.li: I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Fixed Trait Newsletter
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: Fixed the Trait Newletter Appearing on load even though the trait were chosen

additionalNotes.li: I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon

FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.label: Fixed Building
FactionColonies.PatchNoteDef.description: Fixed the Fur Hunter Camp building not working

additionalNotes.li: The Fur Hunter Camp building was not working because I forgot to set some stuff
I have taken it upon myself to update this mod - TheSeaMoon
I have added 2 new building for early era
I have taken it upon myself to update this mod
